Text:
While Claire was talking to the aristocrat, Nu had
left the venue and was investigating the mansion...
This is the last room. It must be around here...

Just as I expected, a hidden bookshelf. Let's see if
it contains the relevant documentsâ€•
Don't move!
*gasp*
...You're back sooner than I expected.

Seriously? That's how you're gonna play off this
situation? ...Anyway, answer me this.
Do you know about the Owl?

You suddenly point your sword at me, and now you
want to talk about some bird?
Don't play dumb!

...If you mean anything other than the bird, I don't
know what you're talking about.

Are you actually Shadow? Did you leave the mask in
Cid's room?
No, I'm not and did not.

...But even if I say that, I doubt you believe me.
Will this convince you?
You sure it's wise to lower that weapon of yours?
It's fine. Otherwise, you won't listen to me.

*sigh* Yes, you're right. In that case, I'll sheathe
my sword as well.

Thank you. I prefer to avoid any conflict with you,
if possible.
Just to be clear, I still don't trust you.

(She's likely not lying. If so, is the true identity
of Shadow...Cid?)

So, what are you doing here? Was the ball not to
your taste?
No. I came here to investigate the demon Diablos.
...Are you researching fairy tales or something?

It's not surprising you think that. But this matter
also concerns you.
Sorry, but I have no idea what you're talking about.
...Even after seeing this?
What are you on about nowâ€•
...Huh? That book...

(The pattern on the cover... Is it the same as the
one on my left hand...?!)
Wait, is it on all these books...?

Yes. Most likely, this study was created by those
who worship the demon Diablos to hide materials
and plot his resurrection.
Resurrection of the demon, for what purpose...?

Let me explain to you what I know about the demon
Diablos...
